Bort Stoma Bandage

  * Circular Abdominalbandage variable stoma opening
  * Inelastic suede composite, elastic insert in back
  * Two support rods
  * Einklettbare reinforcing plate made of plastic
  * Height: 15 cm, 22 cm

Colour White  
  
The Med-Plus

  * Variable ostomy opening by velcro in width adjustable
  * Large skin-friendly edition of the stoma
  * Washable at 90 ° C

indication  
  
Abdominal wall paralysis, abdominal hernia, ileostomy and colostomy after
state with accompanying connective tissue insufficiency
